54 class flag
55 {
56  typedef void (flag::*bool_type)() const;
57  void safeBool() const {}
58 
59 public:
60  bool init = false;
61  int value; //< for enum or boolean values
62 
64  void operator =(int setValue) {
65  if (setValue <= -1)
66  return;
67  init = true;
68  value = setValue;
69  }
70 
71  void checkInit() const {
72  if (!init)
73  throw compute_module::exec_error("PV IO Manager",
74  "Flag used without initialization.");
75  }
76 
78  operator bool_type() const {
79  checkInit();
80  return value ? &flag::safeBool : 0;
81  }
82 
83  bool operator ==(const int testValue) {
84  checkInit();
85  return (value == testValue);
86  }
87  bool operator !=(const int testValue) {
88  checkInit();
89  return (value != testValue);
90  }
91 };
92

368 struct Subarray_IO
369 {
370 public:
371 
373  Subarray_IO(compute_module* cm, std::string cmName, size_t subarrayNumber);
374 
376  void AllocateOutputs(compute_module* cm);
377 
379  void AssignOutputs(compute_module* cm);
380 
381  std::string prefix;
382 
383  enum self_shading {NO_SHADING, NON_LINEAR_SHADING, LINEAR_SHADING};
384 
385  // Managed by Subarray
386  std::unique_ptr<Module_IO> Module; // The PV module for this subarray
387 
388  // Inputs
389  flag enable; // Whether or not the subarray is enabled
390 
391  // Electrical characteristics
392  size_t nStrings; // Number of strings in the subarray
393  int nModulesPerString; // The number of modules per string
394  int mpptInput; // Which inverter MPPT input this subarray is connected to
395 
396  // Physical characteristics
397  double groundCoverageRatio; // The ground coverage ratio [0 - 1]
398  double tiltDegrees; // The surface tilt [degrees]
399  double azimuthDegrees; // The surface azimuth [degrees]
400  int trackMode; // The tracking mode [0 = fixed, 1 = single-axis tracking, 2 = two-axis tracking, 3 = azimuth-axis tracking, 4 = seasonal-tilt
401  double trackerRotationLimitDegrees; // The rotational limit of the tracker [degrees]
402  flag tiltEqualLatitude; // Set the tilt equal to the latitude
403  std::vector<double> monthlyTiltDegrees; // The seasonal tilt [degrees]
404  flag backtrackingEnabled; // Backtracking enabled or not
405  double moduleAspectRatio; // The aspect ratio of the models used in the subarray
406  int nStringsBottom; // Number of strings along bottom from self-shading
407 
408  // Subarray-specific losses
409  std::vector<double> monthlySoiling; // The soiling loss by month [%]
410  double rearIrradianceLossPercent;
411  double dcOptimizerLossPercent;
412  double mismatchLossPercent;
413  double diodesLossPercent;
414  double dcWiringLossPercent;
415  double trackingLossPercent;
416  double nameplateLossPercent;
417  double dcLossTotalPercent;
418 
419  // Shading and snow
420  flag enableSelfShadingOutputs; // Choose whether additional self-shading outputs are displayed
421  int shadeMode; // The shading mode of the subarray [0 = none, 1 = standard (non-linear), 2 = thin film (linear)]
422  flag usePOAFromWeatherFile; // Flag for whether or not a shading model has been selected that means POA can't be used directly for that subarray
423  ssinputs selfShadingInputs; // Inputs and calculation methods for self-shading of the subarray
424  ssoutputs selfShadingOutputs; // Outputs for the self-shading of the subarray
425  shading_factor_calculator shadeCalculator; // The shading calculator model for self-shading
426  flag subarrayEnableSnow; //a copy of the enableSnowModel flag has to exist in each subarray for setting up snow model inputs specific to each subarray
427  pvsnowmodel snowModel; // A structure to store the geometry inputs for the snow model for this subarray- even though the snow model is system wide, its effect is subarray-dependent
428 
430  struct {
431  double poaBeamFront;
432  double poaDiffuseFront;
433  double poaGroundFront;
434  double poaRear;
435  double poaTotal;
436  bool sunUp;
437  double angleOfIncidenceDegrees;
438  double surfaceTiltDegrees;
439  double surfaceAzimuthDegrees;
440  double nonlinearDCShadingDerate;
441  bool usePOAFromWF;
442  int poaShadWarningCount;
443  std::unique_ptr<poaDecompReq> poaAll;
444  } poa;
445 
446  //calculated- subarray power
447  double dcPowerSubarray;
448 
449 };
